Bofors, as part of Saab, has a Code of Conduct that reflects their commitment to ethical and responsible behavior in all areas of the company's activities. Additionally, Saab has a set of policies and guidelines to ensure that their products are not used for unethical purposes, and Bofors adheres to these policies.

In terms of weapons systems specifically, Bofors adheres to international arms export control regimes and other relevant national laws and regulations. They have a strict system in place for reviewing and approving export orders, which includes consideration of the end-use, end-user, and risk of diversion to unauthorized parties or purposes.

Bofors' products and technologies are designed and intended for use by authorized military and government agencies in defense applications. The company takes the responsibility of supplying these products very seriously and works to ensure that they are used ethically and responsibly.

Overall, while Bofors' primary focus is on developing and producing defense industry products, the company is committed to upholding ethical principles and adheres to strict guidelines and policies to help ensure that their products are not used for unethical purposes.
